short_summary: IT Professional Services on an as and when required basis for Testing and Quality Assurance.
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency has arequirement for IT Professional services on an as and when requiredbasis for the services provided by IT Professionals with demonstratedexperience in Testing and Quality Assurance.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) for IT Professional Services

## Title and Identification
Testers (Level 2) and Quality Assurance Specialists/Analysts (Level 3) Service Providers

## Solicitation Details
*RFP reference number:* cb-8357-43854
*RFP amendment number:* 1
*Solicitation number:* 2024-00179
*Publication date:* August 22, 2023
*Closure date:* September 6, 2023, 14:00 EST

## Contractual Information
*Campaign end date:* September 18, 2023
*Expected contract end date:* March 31, 2024

## Service Description
The Innovation, Business Services and Development Branch (IBSDB) at the Canadian Food Inspection Agency requires IT Professional services on an "as and when required basis" for Testing and Quality Assurance. Services will be initiated using a Task Solicitation/Authorization process.

## Selection Criteria and Methods
Variations or combinations of methods can be used to select the most suitable contractors. The selection criteria will be determined by the IBSDB.

## Trade Agreements and Regions
This RFP is open to contractors from the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

The regions for this RFP are:
* Canada
* National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contact Information
Carol Trottier, Senior Business Officer
Phone: (613) 291-2857
Email: [carol.trottier@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:carol.trottier@inspection.gc.ca)
